titleStmt.title: The penitent publican his confession of mouth. Contrition of heart. Vnfained repentance. An feruent prayer vnto God, for mercie and forgiuenesse.
titleStmt.author: Collins, Thomas, fl. 1610-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Creede] for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the white horse, neere the great north doore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
